languages.text: {n}Молодой мужчина, еще совсем мальчишка, падает на колени и поднимает окровавленные руки. Его одежда на боку обожжена и вымазана в запекшейся крови.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, пощады! Вы — хозяин планеты! Только у вас есть власть спасти нас!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Молодой мужчина, почти мальчишка, падает на колени и поднимает окровавленные руки. Его одежда на боку обожженна и вымазана в запекшейся крови.{/n} "Ваше Благородие, пощады! Вы — хозяин планеты! Только у вас есть власть спасти нас!"

languages.text: {n}The young man, practically a boy, falls to his knees and stretches out his bloody hands toward you. His clothes are burned on one side and grimy with baked-in blood.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! You are the sovereign of this planet! Only you have the power to save us!"
languages.original_text: {n}Молодой мужчина, еще совсем мальчишка, падает на колени и поднимает окровавленные руки. Его одежда на боку обожжена и вымазана в запекшейся крови.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, пощады! Вы — хозяин планеты! Только у вас есть власть спасти нас!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The young man, practically a boy, falls to his knees and stretches out his bloody hands toward you. His clothes are burned on one side and grimy with baked-in blood.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! You are the sovereign of this planet! Only you have the power to save us!"

{n}The young man, practically a boy, falls to his knees and stretches out his bloody hands toward you. His clothes are burned on one side and grimy with baked-in blood.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! You are the sovereign of this planet! Only you have the power to save us!"

{n}The young man, practically a boy, falls to his knees and stretches out his bloody hands toward you. His clothes are burned on one side and grimy with baked-in blood.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! You are the sovereign of this planet! Only you have the power to save us!"

{n}The young man, practically a boy, falls to his knees and stretches out his bloody hands toward you. His clothes are burned on one side and grimy with baked-in blood.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! You are the sovereign of this planet! Only you have the power to save us!"

languages.text: {n}青年、というより少年と言うべきか、彼はひざから崩れ落ちて血に染まった手をあなたへと伸ばす。衣服は片面が焼け落ちていて、焦げた血液で汚れている。{/n}「陛下、お慈悲を！陛下がこの星の統治者ですよね！僕らを助ける力があるのは陛下だけなんです！」
languages.original_text: {n}The young man, practically a boy, falls to his knees and stretches out his bloody hands toward you. His clothes are burned on one side and grimy with baked-in blood.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! You are the sovereign of this planet! Only you have the power to save us!"

traits.locale_text: {n}青年、というより少年と言うべきか、彼はひざから崩れ落ちて血に染まった手をあなたへと伸ばす。衣服は片面が焼け落ちていて、焦げた血液で汚れている。{/n}「陛下、お慈悲を！陛下がこの星の統治者ですよね！僕らを助ける力があるのは陛下だけなんです！」

languages.text: {n}那个年轻人只是个半大孩子。他跪倒在地，向你伸出了鲜血淋漓的双手。他的衣服一半已经烧焦了，另一半沾满了焦黑的血迹。{/n}“大人，求求您，发发慈悲吧！您是这颗行星的统治者！只有您有能力拯救我们！”
languages.original_text: {n}The young man, practically a boy, falls to his knees and stretches out his bloody hands toward you. His clothes are burned on one side and grimy with baked-in blood.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! You are the sovereign of this planet! Only you have the power to save us!"

traits.locale_text: {n}那个年轻人只是个半大孩子。他跪倒在地，向你伸出了鲜血淋漓的双手。他的衣服一半已经烧焦了，另一半沾满了焦黑的血迹。{/n}“大人，求求您，发发慈悲吧！您是这颗行星的统治者！只有您有能力拯救我们！”

languages.text: {n}El muchacho, prácticamente un niño, cae de rodillas y extiende sus manos ensangrentadas hacia ti. Sus ropajes se encuentran quemados de un lado y mugrientos por la sangre acumulada.{/n} «¡Tenga piedad, {mf|milord|milady}! ¡Es {mf|el soberano|la soberana} de este planeta! ¡Solo usted tiene el poder de salvarnos!».
languages.original_text: {n}The young man, practically a boy, falls to his knees and stretches out his bloody hands toward you. His clothes are burned on one side and grimy with baked-in blood.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! You are the sovereign of this planet! Only you have the power to save us!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El muchacho, prácticamente un niño, cae de rodillas y extiende sus manos ensangrentadas hacia ti. Sus ropajes se encuentran quemados de un lado y mugrientos por la sangre acumulada.{/n} «¡Tenga piedad, {mf|milord|milady}! ¡Es {mf|el soberano|la soberana} de este planeta! ¡Solo usted tiene el poder de salvarnos!».

languages.text: {n}Der junge Mann, fast noch ein Junge, fällt auf die Knie und streckt dir seine blutigen Hände entgegen. Seine Kleidung ist auf einer Seite verbrannt und mit geronnenem Blut verklebt.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, habt Erbarmen! Ihr seid {mf|der Souverän|die Souveränin} dieses Planeten! Nur Ihr habt die Macht, uns zu retten!"
languages.original_text: {n}The young man, practically a boy, falls to his knees and stretches out his bloody hands toward you. His clothes are burned on one side and grimy with baked-in blood.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! You are the sovereign of this planet! Only you have the power to save us!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der junge Mann, fast noch ein Junge, fällt auf die Knie und streckt dir seine blutigen Hände entgegen. Seine Kleidung ist auf einer Seite verbrannt und mit geronnenem Blut verklebt.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, habt Erbarmen! Ihr seid {mf|der Souverän|die Souveränin} dieses Planeten! Nur Ihr habt die Macht, uns zu retten!"

languages.text: {n}Le jeune homme à peine adulte tombe à genoux et tend ses mains sanglantes vers vous. Ses vêtements sont brûlés d'un côté et couverts de sang séché.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, ayez pitié ! Vous êtes {mf|le souverain|la souveraine} de cette planète et vous {mf|seul|seule} avez le pouvoir de nous sauver ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The young man, practically a boy, falls to his knees and stretches out his bloody hands toward you. His clothes are burned on one side and grimy with baked-in blood.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! You are the sovereign of this planet! Only you have the power to save us!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le jeune homme à peine adulte tombe à genoux et tend ses mains sanglantes vers vous. Ses vêtements sont brûlés d'un côté et couverts de sang séché.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, ayez pitié ! Vous êtes {mf|le souverain|la souveraine} de cette planète et vous {mf|seul|seule} avez le pouvoir de nous sauver ! »

languages.text: {n}Çocuk yaştaki genç adam, dizlerinin üzerine çöküp kanlı ellerini sana doğru uzatıyor. Giysilerinin bir yanı yanmış ve kanla lekelenmiş.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, merhametinize sığınırım! Siz bu gezegenin hükümdarısınız! Bizi kurtaracak güce yalnızca siz sahipsiniz!"
languages.original_text: {n}The young man, practically a boy, falls to his knees and stretches out his bloody hands toward you. His clothes are burned on one side and grimy with baked-in blood.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, have mercy! You are the sovereign of this planet! Only you have the power to save us!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Çocuk yaştaki genç adam, dizlerinin üzerine çöküp kanlı ellerini sana doğru uzatıyor. Giysilerinin bir yanı yanmış ve kanla lekelenmiş.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, merhametinize sığınırım! Siz bu gezegenin hükümdarısınız! Bizi kurtaracak güce yalnızca siz sahipsiniz!"
